name: Here They Come (Trust)
description:
Controls:

WASD - Move

LMB - Shoot / Scan

Directions:

Fight off waves of enemies and spend credits to upgrade between each round.

At the end of each round you gain x+1 credits where x is the number of rounds you have completed.

The 'Trust' mechanic:

Each round you may choose to 'Trust' any number of players. You will spend a number of points, and they will receive double what you spent at the following round. They will not be notified when you take this action, nor will they.

To encourage deception and give plausible deniability, there is a very small chance that your 'Trust' action will not be carried through. In such cases you will recieve a full refund.

Notes:

The game does not reset on death. Please press F5 to reload the page.
